abstract: Toxic megacolon and pulmonary nodules are not seen frequently on diagnosis in pediatric ulcerative colitis patients. This report emphasizes the importance of carefully evaluating and managing complications in pediatric ulcerative colitis cases, especially in the presence of pulmonary nodules.
